input_text:
Job Title: Production Operator

Location: Fairhaven, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
About FUCHS

FUCHS Lubricants Co. is the United States operating unit of FUCHS S.E., the world's largest independent manufacturer of spe-cialty lubricants with global sales of over $3.5 Billion. We provide high quality lubricants and services to a wide range of industries such as automotive, appliance, aerospace manufacturers, pharmaceuticals, transportation, food and beverage, mining, and ener-gy. The organization is constantly developing new technology to meet the ever-changing demands of modern industry and we are recognized for providing world-class technical support to our strong customer base.

Nye Lubricants Inc., a member of the Fuchs Group located in Fairhaven, MA, is a leader in the innovation, formulation and manufacturer of synthetic lubricants. Nye’s lubricants add value to products in a wide range of industries and applications.

MOVING YOUR WORLD By Focusing On Your Success

FUCHS offers a challenging and rewarding working environment where employees are encouraged to develop and grow. We stand behind our core values: trust, creating value, respect, reliability, and integrity. Ours is a culture that fosters creativity and empowerment, values work/life balance, and gives you the freedom to excel. At FUCHS we aim to nurture your capabilities, ideas and career.

Your Areas Of Responsibility

The Production Operator assists the Compounder in the production and packaging of specialty lubricants. The Production Operator must adhere to all regulations, policies, and procedures for health, safety, and envi-ronmental compliance.

 Set up and operate production equipment in accordance with current good manufacturing practices and standard operat-ing procedures Locate material and supplies verifying lots and weights according to the manufacturing order Maintains material-handling equipment by completing pre-use inspections Maintains inventory by identifying, labeling, and placing materials and supplies in stock; recording location of inventory Must complete daily assigned tasks to meet production volume and schedule Prepare finished goods for shipment by packing, labeling and loading on dock

Qualifications We Are Looking For

 High school diploma or equivalent Basic reading, writing and computer skills required Analytical & Mathematic skills Some heavy lifting (up to 75-lbs.) may be required or up to employees’ physical limitations Eight hours of walking/standing/sitting Pushing/Pulling/Moving of raw material containers and production equipment

These Are Your Benefits

Fuchs offers a challenging and rewarding working environment where employees are encouraged to develop and grow as profes-sionals. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on projects that will expand your experience and challenge your abilities in the global marketplace. The position also offers an excellent compensation package and a comprehensive suite of benefits.

Fuchs Lubricants Co. is an equal employment opportunity (EEO)/AA employer and strongly supports diversity in the workplace (m/f/d/v).

PandoLogic. Keywords: General Machine Operator, Location: Fairhaven, MA - 02719

Experience Level (if available): None

Maintains inventory by identifying, labeling, and placing materials and supplies in stock; recording location of inventory.

Prepare finished goods for shipment by packing, labeling, and loading on dock.
